title: Dont want money riot ok :D pls help
body: can some one help why is this bullshit {{champion:122}} and i cannot buy rp :(

replies.body: Make sure you check your bank statement.. When I purchased RP a few times it did this.. granted it didn't happen often.. maybe 2 times in 4 years, I had charges for the RP but didn't actually get credited the RP.. Made a support ticket and everything was fixed :)

Did this occur when you were trying to add a card as a payment method or somewhere else during the purchase process? Most store issues are caused by certain Internet Explorer settings, so I recommend working through our [**Store Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660).

Let me know if this caused any change.
